channel.title: Clustering Analysis on Gene list mining
channel.description: Recent content in Clustering Analysis on Gene list mining

item.title: Clustering Analysis
item.description: 6.1.1 Nbclust 6.1.2 ClustVis 6.1.3 Medusa 6.1.4 wcd 6.1.5 FUAT 6.1.6 hiplot 6.1.7 cola 6.1.1 Nbclust Introduction: The R package provides 30 indices which determine the number of clusters in a data set and it offers also the best clus- tering scheme from different results to the user. In addition, it provides a function to perform k-means and hierarchical clustering with different distance measures and aggre- gation methods. Any combination of validation indices and clustering methods can be requested in a single function call.
